entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
